title: By the King a proclamation for the ordering of tobacco.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers  to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,
notes: Forbidding foreign and domestic tobacco; all tobacco from Virginia and other colonies to be under the control of commissioners.
"Giuen at His Maiesties Court at Windsore, the ninth day of August, in the third yeere of His Reigne of England, Scotland, France, and Ireland.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
